description:
Luffy and his friends vow to defeat the giant tiger that`s been stealing their food, Ace gets angry when his father`s identity is revealed, and Sabo`s parents hire pirates to track down their son!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy Becoming an Apprentice?! A Man Who Fought Against the King of the Pirates!
Luffy Deshiiri!? Kaizoku Ou to Tatakatta Otoko!
Luffy a trouvé son maître ! L`homme qui s`est battu contre le Roi des pirates !
Учитель Луффи! Человек, сражавшийся с Королём пиратов
لوفي يصبح تلميذًا؟! الرّجل الّذي قاتل ضدّ ملك القراصنة!
ルフィ弟子入り!? 海賊王と戦った男!
